page.title: 20ADAM TILEY,A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: I woke up at half past seven and i read until my mum tells me to get up.Then i get out of bed and go downstairs to feed the fish.afterwards i have my breakfast,a wash,clean my teeth and get dressed.Then i go downstairs and read a comic.When its half past eight i tidy up and get my shoes on.When i have these on i brush my hair and then i go to school.When i am at school i say good-bye to my mum and my brother. Then i go into the playground where i talk with someone until the bell goes.After school i go home,get changed and then i go out to play.At five o'clock i go in for my tea.After tea i play until bath and then bedtime.
